artist: Artist: Tsukioka Yoshitoshi; Publisher: Sasaki Toyokichi
catalogue_raissonne: Keyes, Courage and Silence (1982), no. 509.12; Iwakiri, Yoshitoshi (2014), p. 276.
creditline: The Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation, gifts of various donors, by exchange, and gift of Edmond Freis in memory of his parents, Rose and Leon Freis
description: seated woman wearing headdress with yellow bird and white kimono with pattern of figures on back, lined with red print; burning yellow and black lantern at left; grey ground with pale silhouettes of large and small skeletons
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Collection of Thirty-six Ghosts in New Style (Shinkei sanjūrokkaisen 新形三十六怪撰)
title: Picture of the Hell Courtesan’s Enlightment
